link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK (File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 默认起始目录可能失效
  2. 改进 对路径过滤器设置的编辑器重新设计
  3. 改进 在路径过滤器设置中，支持直接编辑
  4. 改进 支持置顶数据库播放列表
  5. 开发 重构路径过滤器、已收藏歌曲和已置顶播放列表的存储
  6. 开发 更新 Gradle 至 8.14.3, 更新 AGP 至 8.11.1, 更新 Kotlin 至 2.2.10, 更新依赖
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: Default start directory may not work on some circumstances
  2. Improve: redesign the editor of Path Filter settings
  3. Improve: support directly editing in Path Filter settings
  4. Improve: support pining database playlists
  5. Development: refactor storage of Path Filter, Favorite Songs and Pinned Playlists
  6. Development: upgrade Gradle to 8.14.3, upgrade AGP to 8.11.1, upgrade Kotlin to 2.2.10, update dependencies

link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK (File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 新增 支持自定义快进和快退的间隔时间
  2. 修复 某些设备上无法正常编辑文件播放列表编辑
  3. 修复 无效速度倍率值可能导致的崩溃
  4. 修复 面包屑路径导航偶尔导致的崩溃
  5. 修复 搜索页中软键盘行为异常
  6. 修复 文件夹页中当文件夹名称冲突导致的若干异常
  7. 改进 播放列表加载性能
  8. 改进 支持导出包含内部播放列表的数据库
  9. 修改 清空数据库后强制重新启动应用
  10. 翻译 更新 俄语 (Yurt Page), 巴西葡萄牙语 (FalaTudo)
  11. 开发 清理代码, 更新依赖
releaseNote.en:
1. New: support customizing seek internal for forwarding and rewinding
  2. Fix: file playlist editing may not work on some devices
  3. Fix: possibly crash due to invalid speed ratio value
  4. Fix: crash due to the bread crumb in Files in rare circumstance
  5. Fix: various unintended behaviors of soft keyboard in Search
  6. Fix: some issues in Folders due to folder name collision
  7. Improve: performance of playlist loading
  8. Improve: support exporting the database of internal playlists
  9. Modify: force to reboot application after purging the database
  10. Translation: update Russian (by Yurt Page), Brazilian Portuguese (by FalaTudo)
  11. Development: cleanup codes, update dependencies

link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK (File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 睡眠定时器在 Android 14 及以上版本上可能失效
  2. 修复 列表最后一项被导航栏挡住
  3. 修复 速度控制对话框导致崩溃
  4. 修复 通过多选操作内部数据库播放列表时崩溃
  5. 修复 更改某些设置后由于主播放器导致偶尔崩溃
  6. 修改 默认播放器按钮设置
  7. 改进 支持导出内部数据库播放列表
  8. 翻译 更新 巴西葡萄牙语 (FalaTudo), 匈牙利语 (Balázs Meskó & Balázs Úr)
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: Sleep timer possibly not working on Android 14 and above
  2. Fix: last item behind navigation bar due to edge-to-edge
  3. Fix: crash due to Speed Control dialog
  4. Fix: crash when operating internal database playlists via multi-selection
  5. Fix: occasional crash due to Main Player after some settings changed
  6. Modify: default player buttons settings
  7. Improve: support for exporting internal database playlists
  8. Translation: update Brazilian Portuguese (by FalaTudo), Hungarian (by Balázs Meskó & Balázs Úr)
